item.title: About
item.description: Chathuranga Lakmal Rajapaksha Software Engineer, AI and Machine Learning Researcher I am very passionate about following topics, Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning Deep Learning You can find my projects and contribute on GitHub. Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to ask. Thanks for reading! Happy Coding!!!

Biography Chathuranga Rajapaksha is a graduate of University of Moratuwa, Sri Lanka. His research interests include Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Deep Learning. She leads the Robotic Neurobiology group, which develops self-reconfiguring robots, systems of self-organizing robots, and mobile sensor networks.
